title: Two Sum
prompt:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.

You can return the answer in any order.
optimal_approach: Use a hash map to store seen values and their indices. Iterate through the array, check if target - current_val exists in the map. As you iterate, two numbers that add up to target will be found. This approach allows for O(n) time complexity and O(n) space complexity.
